Template.Name: SmartHotel360
Template.Description:
aspdotnet  mobiledevops

This template contains work items and code for SmartHotel360, an end-to-end reference application for the entire business, including a suite of mobile and desktop apps for business travelers (iOS, Android, and Windows), a website for booking a stay, and even an app for hotel employees to track and resolve maintenance issues. SmartHotel360 has many other reference applications, including a microservice oriented architecture implemented using Docker containers that power the client experience, a website powered by ASP.NET Core 2 for booking trips, and a sentiment analysis app for tracking customer experiences.For more details, please see the project page on GitHub at

For more information refer SmartHotel360

Template.Name: MyHealthClinic
Template.Description:
aspdotnet   azureappservice

This template provisions team project which contains sample ASP.NET Core web application-My Health Clinic, along with build & release definitions, to deploy the application to Azure App Service using Azure Pipelines.

Template.Name: PartsUnlimited
Template.Description:
aspdotnet   azureappservice

This template is used to provision Team Project containing a sample ASP.NET web application-Parts Unlimited, along with build & release definitions and customized to deploy the application to Azure App Service using Azure Pipelines.

Template.Name: MyShuttle
Template.Description:
java  azureappservice

This template contains code for a sample Java application which will be provisioned along with build & release definitions configured and customized to deploy the application to an Azure App service.

For more information refer Deploying a Java application on Tomcat

Template.Name: Docker
Template.Description:
docker   azureappservice  aspdotnetcore containers

This template provisions team project which contains code of Docker based ASP.NET Core web application along with build & release definitions, to deploy the application to the Docker containers in the Azure App Service (Linux) using Azure Pipelines.

For more information refer Deploying Docker Containers to Azure App Service

Template.Name: AKS
Template.Description:
docker   kubernetes   aspdotnetcore azurecontainerservice

Provision the team project using this template to build a Docker based ASP.NET Core web application and deploy to a Kubernetes cluster running in Azure Container Service (AKS) using Azure DevOps.

For more information refer Deploying to Azure Container Service (AKS)

Template.Name: GitHub
Template.Description:
aspdotnet   azureappservice

Use this team project template to deploy an ASP.Net sample application to Azure App Service using CI/CD pipeline in Azure DevOps with code repository in GitHub.

For more information refer How to continuously deliver code on GitHub with Azure Pipelines

Template.Name: Octopus
Template.Description:
php   octopus

This template contains code for a sample PHP application which will be compiled using Azure Pipelines and deployed using Octopus Deploy on to an Azure App service.

For more information refer Integrating Octopus Deploy

Template.Name: Selenium

This template contains code of Parts Unlimited, a fictional eCommerce application which will be provisioned along with build & release definitions and customized to deploy and test the application on an Azure VM using Selenium.

For more information refer Driving continuous testing with Selenium

Template.Name: devops-mobile
Template.Description: A simple Xamarin app named Acquaint. The app is a simple list of contacts, each of which can be viewed in a detail screen and modified in an edit screen. It runs on iOS 9+, Android 4.2+, and UWP (mobile and desktop).

Template.Name: BasicBot

Template.Name: bikesharing 360
Template.Description: BikeSharing360 is a fictitious example of a smart bike sharing system with 10,000 bikes distributed in 650 stations located throughout New York City and Seattle. Their vision is to provide a modern and personalized experience to riders and to run their business with intelligence.
